name: Beyond Reality (itch) (Team_Tortilla)
description:
Developed by Team Tortilla from UdG (Students).

Synopsis:

You wake up at home, where paranormal events happen. Discover the story behind them trying to get out of the house. Find the different keys, solve the puzzles and try to survive.

Is everything you see part of reality?

Note: This game is a student's project. You may find some errors, let us know in the comments below.

Controls:

 

Keyboard

Gamepad

Player Movement

WASD

Left Joystick

Camera Movement

Mouse

Right Joystick

Run

Shift

Pressing Left Joystick

Object Interaction

Left Click

A

Inventory Open/Close

I

Back Button

Notes Open/Close

N

Y

Pause Menu

Esc

Start Button

Exit From Hiding

E

B

 Girl's sound  from: Lara Sluyter, LARA'S HORROR SOUNDS
